meanings.definition: A type of cocktail made with gin and vermouth, typically garnished with a pickled onion.
meanings.sent1: At the party, they served delicious gibsons with pickled onions.
meanings.sent2: I ordered a gibsons cocktail at the bar last night.
meanings.sent3: The gibsons at the event were so tasty, they disappeared quickly.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter bubbled up like a shaken gibsons cocktail.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the gibsons lingered in the air, tempting everyone.

meanings.definition: A type of electric guitar designed by the company Gibson.
meanings.sent1: The musician played a beautiful melody on his Gibsons guitar.
meanings.sent2: She saved up to buy a new Gibsons electric guitar.
meanings.sent3: The Gibsons guitar seemed to hum with its own tune.
meanings.sent4: His fingers danced on the strings of the Gibsons guitar like magic.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the Gibsons guitar filled the room with music.

meanings.sent1: The Gibsons family has a long history in this town.
meanings.sent2: Mr. Gibsons greeted us warmly at the door.
meanings.sent3: The Gibsons clan always hosts the best gatherings.
meanings.sent4: The Gibsons name echoes through the generations like a proud banner.
meanings.sent5: The Gibsons legacy is cherished by all who know them.
